attributes.additional_details: Autumn hunting helps to train young hounds to kill foxes.
attributes.background: Young hounds are trained to kill young fox cubs.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Hunting foxes with dogs is already illegal, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You can find out more about the law on hunting mammals here:

https://www.gov.uk/hunting/mammals

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

There's already a petition calling for foxes to be made a protected species, which you might like to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245865
